resources.string:
The __serve buttons__ indicate 
 
- what player or team should serve 
- in case of doubles, what player of a team is serving 
- in case of doubles, if the app initially indicates the wrong player as server, simply swap the player names by long clicking the team 

The serve indication changes to the other player and or team if applicable after a game.
__That\'s it. Enjoy your games.__ \n\nStart a new match by tapping this button.
